26  kDegrees,
27  COUNT

58 class Units {
59 public:

63 
64  template<auto From, auto To, typename T>
65  static T Convert(T v) {
66  return (T)Convert_impl<decltype(From), From, To>((double)v);
67  }
68 
69  template<auto From, typename T>
70  static T ConvertToSI(T v) {
71  return (T)ConvertToSI_impl<decltype(From), From>((double)v);
72  }
73 
74  template<auto To, typename T>
75  static T ConvertFromSI(T v) {
76  return (T)ConvertFromSI_impl<decltype(To), To>((double)v);
77  }

87  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

92  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

97 
98 protected:
99 
100  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
103 
104  template<typename EnumType, EnumType From, EnumType To, typename T>
105  static T Convert_impl(T v) {
106  if constexpr (To == From) {
107  // No conversion required
108  return v;
109  }
110  else if constexpr (To == EnumType(0)) {
111  // Converting to SI units
112  return ConvertToSI_impl<EnumType, From>(v);
113  }
114  //else if constexpr (From == EnumType(0)) {
115  // // Converting from SI units
116  // return ConvertFromSI_impl<EnumType, To>(v);
117  //}
118  else {
119  // Convert to SI, and then from SI to the final output
120  // TODO: Fix precision issues with compile-time multiplication
121  //constexpr double combinedFactor = ToSIFactor<EnumType, From>() * FromSIFactor<EnumType, To>();
122  //return T(v * combinedFactor);
123  double p1 = ConvertToSI_impl<EnumType, From>(v);
124  double p2 = FromSIFactor<EnumType, To>();
125  return p1 * p2;
126  }
127  }
128 
129 
130  template<typename EnumType, EnumType From, typename T>
131  static T ConvertToSI_impl(T v) {
132  return (T)(v * ToSIFactor<EnumType, From>());
133  }
134 
135  template<typename EnumType, EnumType From>
136  static constexpr double ToSIFactor() {
137  if constexpr (From == EnumType(0)) {
138  // Converting from SI type to SI
139  return 1.0;
140  }
141  else {
142  if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, AngularUnits>) {
143  constexpr double factor = s_angularConversionsToSI[(size_t)From];
144  return factor;
145  }
146  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, DistanceUnits>) {
147  constexpr double factor = s_distanceConversionsToSI[(size_t)From];
148  return factor;
149  }
150  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, TimeUnits>) {
151  constexpr double factor = s_timeConversionsToSI[(size_t)From];
152  return factor;
153  }
154  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, MassUnits>) {
155  constexpr double factor = s_massConversionsToSI[(size_t)From];
156  return factor;
157  }
158  else {
159  Logger::Throw("Unrecognized enum type");
160  return 0.0;
161  }
162  }
163  }
164 
165  template<typename EnumType, EnumType To, typename T>
166  static T ConvertFromSI_impl(T v) {
167  return (T)(v * FromSIFactor<EnumType, To>());
168  }
169 
170  template<typename EnumType, EnumType To>
171  static constexpr double FromSIFactor() {
172  if constexpr (To == EnumType(0)) {
173  // Converting from SI type to SI
174  return 1.0;
175  }
176  else {
177  if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, AngularUnits>) {
178  constexpr double factor = 1.0 / s_angularConversionsToSI[(size_t)To];
179  return factor;
180  }
181  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, DistanceUnits>) {
182  constexpr double factor = 1.0 / s_distanceConversionsToSI[(size_t)To];
183  return factor;
184  }
185  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, TimeUnits>) {
186  constexpr double factor = 1.0 / s_timeConversionsToSI[(size_t)To];
187  return factor;
188  }
189  else if constexpr (std::is_same_v<EnumType, MassUnits>) {
190  constexpr double factor = 1.0 / s_massConversionsToSI[(size_t)To];
191  return factor;
192  }
193  else {
194  Logger::Throw("Unrecognized enum type");
195  return 0.0;
196  }
197  }
198  }
199 
200  template<typename T>
201  static constexpr size_t round(double x, double tolerance = 1e-8) {
202  static_assert(std::is_integral_v<T>, "T must be an integral type");
203  return T(x + tolerance);
204  }
205 
207 
208  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
211 
212  static constexpr std::array<double, (size_t)AngularUnits::COUNT> s_angularConversionsToSI
213  {
214  1.0, // Radians to radians
215  3.141592653589793238462643383279 /180.0 // Degrees to radians
216  };
217 
218  static constexpr std::array<double, (size_t)DistanceUnits::COUNT> s_distanceConversionsToSI
219  {
220  1.0, // Meters to meters
221  1000, // Kilometers to meters
222  0.01, // Centimeters to meters
223  0.0254, // Inches to meters
224  0.3048, // Feet to meters
225  1609.344 // Miles to meters
226  };
227 
228  static constexpr std::array<double, (size_t)TimeUnits::COUNT> s_timeConversionsToSI
229  {
230  1.0, // Seconds to seconds
231  60.0, // Minutes to seconds
232  3600.0, // Hours to seconds
233  24.0 * 3600.0, // Days to seconds
234  7.0 * 24.0 * 3600.0, // Weeks to seconds
235  365.25 * 24.0 * 3600.0 // Julian years to seconds
236  };
237 
238  static constexpr std::array<double, (size_t)MassUnits::COUNT> s_massConversionsToSI
239  {
240  1.0, // kg to kg
241  0.45359237 // pounds to kg
242  };
243 
245 
246 };

249 constexpr auto RadToDeg = Units::Convert<AngularUnits::kRadians, AngularUnits::kDegrees, double>;
